title: So is 100% Crit a must now on ADCs?
body:
i find that now with all the marksman changes that i tend to build 100% crit and IE in all my adcs.


like for instance 100% crit Twitch with new Hurricane can be pretty deadly.


my 100% crit build usually involves the following items:

Berserk Greaves
IE
Rapid Fire Cannon
Upgraded Last Whisper
Hurricane
Guardian Angel
buy Shiv while GA is on cooldown



this gives me 110% crit chance so that every attack crits and 110% attack speed which is insane.



is this going to be like the norm in LCS now because theres so much crit chance items now?
